column1: NGR is Dolfor Hall, which the observer, Mr W B Pugh, owned. The 1880s record notes that Dolfor Church is 60 Yards West, which would put the guage 500 m east of this NGR. Apparently there was a Met Office MIDAS station at Dolfor Hall from 1975 to 2006.

The 1894 record states that the gauge may have been leaking from 1894 to 1898; the guage was replaced at Easter 1898. The 1898 total is in brackets but none of the monthly readings are; the total ha been left in this record
